Verses: 1  Manushar Namakku Virodhamaai Ezhumbinapodhu, Karththar Namadhu Pakkaththiliraavittaal,
3 avargal Kobam Nammel Erigaiyil, Nammai Uyirode Vizhungiyiruppaargal.
4 appozhudhu Thanneergal Nammel Paaindhu, Vellangal Namadhu Aaththumaavinmel Perugi,
5 kondhalikkum Jalangal Namadhu Aaththumaavinmel Purandupoyirukkum Endru Isravel Ippozhudhu Solvadhaaga.
6 nammai Avargaludaiya Parkalukku Iraiyaaka Oppukkodaadhirukkira Karththarukku Sthoththiram.
7 vedarudaiya Kannikku Thappina Kuruviyaippola Nammudaiya Aaththumaa Thappitru, Kanni Theriththadhu, Naam Thappinom.
8 nammudaiya Sagaayam Vaanaththaiyum Boomiyaiyum Undaakkina Karththarudaiya Naamaththil Ulladhu.
